Name: Name Change, Harriet Tubman Square, Manhattan
Title: A Local Law in relation to a square name, Harriet Tubman Square, Borough of Manhattan.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.AgendaNote: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:


      Section 1.  The following square name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.


	New name			Present name			Limits
Harriet Tubman Square		None				the portions of Frederick                                                                                                    Douglass Boulevard and 
									St. Nicholas Avenue,
									extending from West 120th 
									Street to West 122nd Street

      
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
